name: SPY SWATTER 2
description:
SPY SWATTER 2

Bad Dudes have stolen Top Secret Files and scattered them all over the World !
You have to Travel to Cool Locations and Get The Bad Dudes, Get the Files and Save us ALL !

Travel on Foot or By Car.
Go to Several Global Locations inspired by Los Angeles, London, and Tokyo !

Use Different Weapons (Machine Gun, ShotGun, Rockets).
Reload with AMMO found around the Map.
You can also use Hand-to-Hand Combat !

You can drive any Car on the Map, including Your Top Secret Spy Car with Cool Deployable Gadgets like Machine Guns and Rockets !

The Game features procedurally generated Maps utilizing advanced Artificial intelligence for Optimization.

Make sure to try out 'Bullet Time' during Shoot-outs or Car Stunts for a Cool Effect !

The Game is Built with the GPU Melting Power of Unreal Engine 5 to create massive Cities to Explore with Extreme Levels of Detail.
** { Make Sure to have the Latest Graphics Drivers Installed } **

#UnrealEngine5
